casebody.data:
James R. BRIGHT, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES. No. 18-7132. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 19, 2019.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied. Justice SOTOMAYOR, with whom Justice GINSBURG joins, dissenting from the denial of certiorari: I dissent for the reasons set out in Brown v. United States, 586 U.S.----, --- S.Ct. ----, ---L.Ed.2d ---- (2018) (Sotomayor, J., dissenting).
